name: telecom
description: Telecom service with Asterisk PBX, event processing, and API functionality

scripts.db:migrate:events:dev: cross-env EVENTS_POSTGRES_HOST=localhost EVENTS_POSTGRES_PORT=5432 EVENTS_POSTGRES_USERNAME=postgres EVENTS_POSTGRES_PASSWORD=postgres EVENTS_POSTGRES_DATABASE=events npm run db:migrate:events
scripts.db:migrate:api:dev: cross-env API_POSTGRES_HOST=localhost API_POSTGRES_PORT=5432 API_POSTGRES_USERNAME=postgres API_POSTGRES_PASSWORD=postgres API_POSTGRES_DATABASE=api npm run db:migrate:api
scripts.db:migrate:events:prod: cross-env EVENTS_POSTGRES_HOST=production-events-db EVENTS_POSTGRES_PORT=5432 npm run db:migrate:events
scripts.db:migrate:api:prod: cross-env API_POSTGRES_HOST=production-api-db API_POSTGRES_PORT=5432 npm run db:migrate:api
scripts.db:migrate:all:dev: npm run db:migrate:events:dev && npm run db:migrate:api:dev
scripts.db:migrate:all:prod: npm run db:migrate:events:prod && npm run db:migrate:api:prod
scripts.docker:restart: npm run docker:down && npm run docker:up && npm run docker:migrate
